effects: Increase magic damage against Humans by 30%
Increase magic damage against Avians by 30%
Increase magic damage against Beasts by 30%
Increase magic damage against Plantoids by 30%
Increase magic damage against Insects by 30%
name: Transcender
Transcender
種之超越者
종의 초월자
Transcendance
Transhumanist
Trascendencia
desc_short: Boost magic damage against human, plant, avian, beast and insect monsters
魔法攻擊時提高對人植物鳥獸蟲系魔物的傷害
마법 공격 시 인간, 식물, 조류, 짐승, 곤충형 마물에 대한 피해량 상승
Augmente les dégâts magiques contre les monstres de type humain, plante, oiseau, bête et insecte
Mehr Magiesch. gegen Menschen, Pflanzen, Vögel, Bestien + Insekten
Aumenta el daño mágico a hum/plan/ave/bes/ins
desc_long: Boosts magic damage inflicted on human, plantoid, beast and insect monsters.
使用魔法時提高對人、植物、鳥、獸、蟲系魔物的傷害。
마법 실행 시 인간, 식물, 조류, 짐승, 곤충형 마물에게 주는 피해량이 상승합니다.
Augmente les dégâts magiques contre les monstres de type humain, plante, oiseau, bête et insecte.
Erhöht den magischen Schaden gegen Menschen, Pflanzen, Bestien, Vögel und Insekten.
Aumenta el daño mágico a enemigos de tipo humano, planta, bestia e insecto
